feed.title: Requestly Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Requestly: February 17, 2025
entry.content:
What's Changed

âœ¨ New Features

  • Bulk Actions Support in API client: Select multiple requests and collections to move, duplicate, export, and delete in bulk. Learn More

ğŸ› ï¸ Improvements

  • Enhanced URL Field in API Client: The smaller URL field with the new 2-column layout of API Client was causing issues in working with the URL field. The input URL field now spans the full width. It provides complete visibility and a better experience.
  • TypeScript Upgrade: Upgraded TypeScript internally to improve performance, better type safety, and support the latest features.

ğŸ› Bug Fixes

  • Fixed a critical issue causing crashes when displaying names.
  • Fixed an issue where renaming a request caused unintended duplication.
  • Status text now correctly populates in scripts, providing accurate information for debugging and development
  • Addressed issues causing crashes related to undefined body in FixedRequestLogPane.js.

entry.title: New release for Requestly: February 24, 2025
entry.content:
What's Changed

âœ¨ New Features

  • Import Bruno Collections: You can now bring your Bruno collections to Requestly!

ğŸ› ï¸ Improvements

  • API Client error messages are improved for a better understanding.

ğŸ› Bug Fixes

  • Resolved multiple TypeScript type issues and errors.
  • Fixed edge cases causing duplicate collections during bulk export.
  • Fixed an issue where query parameters were not clearing from the URL when deleted from the table.
  • Fixed a bug where moving a request to a new collection showed no collection found.

entry.title: New release for Requestly: April 7, 2025
entry.content:
What's Changed

ğŸš€ New

  • Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) now supports a Viewer role
    The new Viewer role allows read-only access, ensuring sensitive actions like editing or deleting are restricted.
    ğŸ‘‰ Learn more about user roles

ğŸ› Fixes

  • Fixed minification issue in Editor and removed EditorV1 dependency
  • Prevented Google Translate from breaking the app by overriding Node methods
  • Resolved Sentry error for undefined(length)
  • Prevented app crash due to empty/null values in Typography
  • Fixed initialization bug in clientStorageService
  • Fixed issue with unsaved tab changes appearing for existing requests

ğŸ§¹ Chores

  • Optimized code to reduce bundle size

entry.title: New release for Requestly: April 28, 2025
entry.content:
What's Changed

ğŸ› Fixes

  • Fixed tabs navigation reset issue
  • Fixed rule status syncing bug
  • Fixed disappearing environment table row on duplicate keys
  • Fixed local sync tabs regression
  • Fixed member count issue in billing dashboard
  • Fixed an issue where code in the editor was not persisted after saving or reopening a Script Rule.
  • Fixed a missing Export cURL option in the API Client.

ğŸ› ï¸ Improvements

  • Refactored tabs for better performance

entry.title: New release for Requestly: May 12, 2025
entry.content:
What's Changed

ğŸš€ New

â€¢ Requestly joins BrowserStack to build the future of application testing. Read announcement

ğŸ› ï¸ Improvements

â€¢ Improved API Client sidebar and header styling for better visual clarity â€¢ Replaced API Client toasts with Ant Design notifications for consistency

ğŸ› Fixes

â€¢ Fixed fullscreen toggle not working in Rule & Mocks editor â€¢ Fixed user role not updating in a workspace issues â€¢ Resolved scroll issues across the app â€¢ Addressed recent crashes causing app instability
